footer.description: Making agriculture transparent, profitable, and accessible through technology.

hero.desc: A specialized digital ecosystem empowering farmers with financial clarity and connecting merchants directly to the source. Transparent pricing, better profits.

farmer.title: Empowering Farmers
farmer.desc: Comprehensive tools to manage your farm as a business.
farmer.feat1_desc: Log every expense and sale with our simplified ledger system.
farmer.feat2_desc: See standard prices updated by regional merchants.
farmer.feat3_desc: Automated harvest reports to help you plan for the next season.

merchant.title: Merchant Solutions
merchant.desc: Source directly and manage your competitive buying rates.
merchant.feat1_desc: Update your own prices to attract farmers in your vicinity.
merchant.feat2_desc: Compare your offers against admin-verified market rates.
merchant.feat3_desc: Streamline how you receive and verify produce from your farmers.

hero.title: Market Prices
hero.subtitle: Real-time updates of the latest market prices from major trading centers across the country, all in one place.

table.no_data: No price data available for this selection.

farmer.hero_desc: AgriBridge provides comprehensive tools to manage your farm as a business. Track finances, monitor national trends, and connect directly to the source.
farmer.features_subheading: Everything you need to move from manual logging to a professional digital ecosystem.
farmer.feature_income_desc: Log every expense and sale with our simplified ledger. Keep records of sales income and automatically calculate net profit without manual math.
farmer.feature_seasonal_desc: Record your expenses for each farming season and conveniently view a detailed annual expense summary to plan for next year.
farmer.feature_market_desc: View market prices from markets across the entire country. Monitor standard prices updated daily by regional merchants.
farmer.feature_direct_desc: Eliminate middlemen. You can easily communicate directly with merchants to negotiate better deals for your harvest.
farmer.trust_1_desc: Every price update and merchant account is manually verified by our team to prevent fraud.
farmer.trust_2_desc: Generate instant profitability reports to help you plan your next season with data-driven confidence.
farmer.trust_3_desc: Your digital records are kept safe and organized, making it easier to apply for agricultural.
farmer.cta_final_desc: Join a community of farmers who are using data to grow their profits and secure their future.

merchant.hero_desc: AgriBridge connects professional merchants to a verified network of farmers. Set your rates, manage collections, and stabilize your supply chain with real-time data.
merchant.features_desc: Stop relying on fragmented phone calls. Manage your entire buying operation from a single dashboard.
merchant.feature_price_desc: Set your custom buying rates based on regional demand. Your prices are broadcasted directly to farmers in your environment.
merchant.feature_loyalty_desc: Build long-term partnerships with a curated directory of local farmers. View historical yield data and reliability ratings to secure your supply chain with trusted partners.
merchant.feature_logs_desc: Eliminate paperwork. Log every bag received and every payment made with instant digital receipts.
merchant.trust_desc: AgriBridge isn't just a platform; it's a verification layer for Myanmar's agriculture. We ensure that every transaction builds a data history that benefits both the buyer and the seller.
merchant.trust_source_desc: Every farmer on our platform is verified. Know the origin of your produce and build long-term buying partnerships.
merchant.trust_market_desc: Compare your rates against national averages. Stay competitive and attract the best harvests in your region.
merchant.cta_final_title: Ready to optimize your supply chain?
merchant.cta_final_desc: Join the growing network of merchants digitizing their collection points and securing high-quality produce directly from the source.

dialog.chooseAccount: Choose what type of account you want to open.

registration.otpSent: OTP sent! Please check your email or phone.

pending_approval.title: Application Received!
pending_approval.description: Your merchant verification documents have been submitted. Our team is currently reviewing your details.
pending_approval.restricted_item1: Posting trade offers or setting prices

privacy.commitment_desc: We believe your farm data is as valuable as your land. AgriBridge is built to be your trusted digital partner, ensuring your records are never sold, never leaked, and always under your control.
privacy.section1_desc: To provide you with accurate profit analysis and seasonal history, we only record the details you choose to share:
privacy.data_profile_text: Your name and phone number for secure access.
privacy.data_logs_text: Expenses for fertilizer, seeds, labor, and your total income from harvests.
privacy.data_visual_text: Images of receipts or bills you upload for your own bookkeeping.
privacy.section2_desc: We use your data strictly to help you run a more profitable farm business. We use it to:
privacy.usage_item1_desc: Turning raw numbers into clear reports so you know exactly how much you earned.
privacy.usage_item2_desc: Backing up your digital book so you never lose your data, even if your phone is damaged.
privacy.section3_title: 3. A Digital Fence Around Your Records
privacy.security_highlight: We use industrial-grade encryptionâ€”think of it as a high-security lock on your digital barn.
privacy.security_promise: No data is ever sold to third-party merchants or advertisers.
privacy.section4_desc: You are the owner of your information. AgriBridge is simply the tool. You have the right to:
privacy.closing_quote: "AgriBridge honors the tradition of Myanmar's farming families by protecting their digital future."

about.hero_desc: AgriBridge isn't just a ledger; it's a commitment to empower the millions of farmers who feed our nation with the data they need to thrive.
about.why_desc1: For generations, Myanmar's farmers have managed complex seasonal cycles using nothing but memory and paper. In a rapidly changing market, this lack of data created a gap.
about.why_desc2_end: to connect hard work with smart data, allowing farmers to see their true net profit in real-time.
about.approach_desc: Built by developers who grew up in farming families.

contact.hero_desc: Whether you're a farmer needing technical help or a merchant looking to partner, our team is ready to bridge the gap.
contact.direct_channels_desc: Prefer direct communication? Reach out to us through any of these verified AgriBridge channels.
contact.email_desc: For general inquiries and technical help.
contact.form_message_placeholder: How can our team help your farm today?
contact.form_disclaimer: By clicking send, you agree to our privacy policy and terms of service.

security.password_desc: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.

notifications.desc: Configure how you want to receive alerts.

notifications.push_desc: Receive instant alerts on your mobile device.

modals.delete_desc: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your profile data, documents, and merchant information will be permanently deleted from AgriBridge.

toast.season_required: Please start an agricultural season first.

preorder.title: Place Preorder
preorder.terms_desc: Please review our terms and privacy policy before placing a preorder with

fields.address_placeholder: Enter your full street address, village, or landmark

terms.commitment_text: By participating in this preorder, you are required to provide a valid NRC and active contact information. Please be aware that your request is contingent upon the merchant's current capacity and stock availability.
terms.data_text: To process your order, your personal details (Name, Phone, NRC, and Address) will be shared with the designated merchant. This information is used strictly for logistical fulfillment.
terms.harvest_text: The delivery schedule is a preliminary estimate only. You must acknowledge that actual timing depends entirely on crop maturity, weather-related harvest conditions, and transportation availability.
terms.price_text: Note that pricing is subject to change based on the quality and specifications of the goods for delivery.
terms.checkbox: I have read and agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. I understand my information will be processed to complete this transaction.
